description:
Train French noun genders using spaced repetition
La Et Le is a minimalist Android app for learning the grammatical gender
of French nouns (“le” or “la”).

The app uses a spaced repetition system (SRS) and a frequency-ranked list
of nouns to help learners memorize efficiently.

Features:
- Learn and review French noun genders
- Spaced repetition scheduling
- Audio pronunciation samples
- Progress statistics and streak tracking
- Customizable reminders
- Wiktionary links for each word

No ads, no tracking, no proprietary services.
